name: 100 Questions!
description:
100 general knowledge questions. 5 lives. Can you survive until the end without losing it all?

100 questions is a game I built the foundation of a few weeks ago when I was revising the basics of Unity. I worked on it more in the last few days when I was bored, and here it is!

My biggest hope with this game was to provide good trivia questions. Nothing too stupid but nothing to vague either, it's a varied set of questions that everyone should know about, but I know a lot of people just don't. Leave a comment if you have any feedback at all!

Black Screen? Try updating your browser to the latest version or using Firefox/Google Chrome.
